rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has section
έχει τομέα
hat Bereich
имеет район
a pour section
tem seção
有区域
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property links an area to the instance of E18 Physical Thing upon which it is found. It is typically used when a named E41 Appellation is not appropriate. E18 Physical Thing may be subdivided into arbitrary regions. P59 has section (is located on or within) is a shortcut. If the E53 Place is identified by a Section Definition, a more detailed representation can make use of the fully developed (i.e. indirect) path from E18 Physical Thing through P58 has section definition (defines section), E41 Appellation, P87 is identified by (identifies) to E53 Place. A Place can only be located on or within one Physical Object.
